lead_paragraph: It is the Wall Street version of the grassy knoll.
snippet: The estate of Lehman Brothers Holdings has subpoenaed records from big hedge funds and Goldman Sachs as it seeks to recover money lost in Lehman's collapse.

headline.main: Fuld to Mount Lehman Defense as Inquiry Grows

abstract: The estate of Lehman Brothers Holdings has subpoenaed records from big hedge funds and Goldman Sachs as it seeks to recover money lost in Lehman's collapse.
